title: Petar Stoychev (boxer)
text: Petar Stoychev (born 15 February 1946) is a Bulgarian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201968%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20welterweight">men's light welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1968%20Summer%20Olympics">1968 Summer Olympics</a>.
